title: Google Photos will add colour to your old black-and-white photographs
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Google Photos will also soon be able to suggest quick edits on pictures, suchas a rotation or increasing exposure, or even making the main subject standout by making the background black and white.Photos will also recognise documents, and allow you to convert photographs ofthem into PDFs that look just like scans.It isn’t clear when these features will roll out to the Google Photos app, butwe’ll let you know as soon as we know.**Are you impressed with the upcoming features? Share your thoughts@TrustedReviews.**
